Posts.Content: Hey jsj  My mum had a mastectomy on 4th September.  Mum recommends Asda and M&S for post surgery bras.  The hospital should let you know but they said no underwire. Mum found it uncomfortable after the op so took her bra off when she got home to let the wound heal. Good luck with your treatment xx
